thread.title: Kwabena Agyapong Punches Mahama At Amansan Fm Uk
thread.title_full: Kwabena Agyapong Punches Mahama At Amansan Fm Uk

title: Kwabena Agyapong Punches Mahama At Amansan Fm Uk
text:
Politics | 11 October 2015 20:32 CET Kwabena Agyapong Punches Mahama At Amansan Fm Uk By Amansan Network 
Kwabena Agyei Agyapong,General Secretary of N.P.P. has accused President Mahama,his government and his Party(NDC) of corruption and inflicting huge debts on the Country which has compelled Ghanaians tilo live in hard conditions. 
The General Secretary was being interviewed on Kyere wadwen Political talkshow on Amansan FM UK&GH and hosted by Amansanboafuo Osei Frimpong stated that,it is ridiculous that a Country like Poland will go on the International Market and raise 1.76dollars at 0.94% and Ghana will go to the same Market and borrow at 10.75%. 
The General Secretary criticized the way the country is being run and stated that every Ghanaian owes GHC3,500 as compared to GHC400 when NPP led by Ex President Kuffour left Office in 2009. 
He said this mismanagement of the economy can only be solve if Ghanaians vote out NDC and its government in 2016. 
Mr Kwabena Agyapong also spoke about the voters register and asked all Party members to unite and work towards victory 2016. 
Kyere wadwen always live on Amansan FM UK in Milton Keynes andAmansan GH in Adenta Accra Ghana from 8pm-12midnight UK time. 
From:
